## Land share in Caatinga municiaplities
:::{.nonincremental}
::::{.columns}
:::{.column width="50%"}

- ~ 1 million registered properties in 1204 municiaplities
  - 97.8% Small properties
       - 17.9 Mha
       - 51% forested
  - 2.2% Large properties
       - 15.2 Mha
       - 69% forested
:::

## Adapated strategies 
| Type of prevailing deficit | Restoration strategy | 
|-----|:-----|
| Large holders     | Active restoration; legal compliance; restoration supply chain   | 
| Small holders   | Agorforestry; biocutlural restoration  |
| Hybrid      | Context dependent combination of all strategies     | 

## Spatialization of restoration strategies
![](libs/deficit4.png)


## Restoration must not reproduce land inequality

:::{.nonincremental}
::::{.columns}
:::{.column width="50%"}
  - Smallholders
    - ~1ha
    - small-scale farms
  - [Scale up agroforestry]{style="color: red;"}

:::

:::{.column width="50%"}
  - Largeholders
    - ~40ha
    - Intesive land use
  - [Impulse restoration supply chain]{style="color: red;"}

:::
::::
:::
